properties.markdownProperty:
Take in mind the following considerations when fulfilling the code above:
- `id` attribute must be unique within the archetype repository. Check all archetypes identifiers to prevent collisions.
- `classes` attribute defines the archetypes classes (separated using spaces). The last class will be the main archetype class, it is used to determine the archetype icon.
- `acceptedChildren` attribute is used to define what class of archetypes can be added as children. Special keywords `:Proteus-none` and `:Proteus-any` can be used to determine that no archetypes are accepted or any archetype is accepted no matter the class.
- `acceptedChildren` attribute is used to define what class of archetypes accepts as parent. Special keywords `:Proteus-none` and `:Proteus-any` can be used to determine that no archetypes are accepted or any archetype is accepted no matter the class.
